TopicTitle: ksp mac crash help help help....

Articles.Content:
hello gents and lady gents.

my problem is that i have ksp .90 installed on MAC BOOK PRO 2011 edition.

processor 2.2ghz

memory 8gb (both 4gb slots are used)

graphics intel hd graphics 3000 512 mb

os- os x yosemite

mods installed.

-DRE

-Chatter

-EVE

-Texture replacer

-ONLY THE Astronomers Atmospheres.cfg file from the astronomers visual pack.

i load up just fine and then the contracts page turns multiple colors or when selecting parts they also turn multiple colors and then my ksp stops responding...

some help would be amazing

Same thing happening over here on my iMac, but with different stats (OSX 10.9, AMD, 8gb memory). The game runs fine for a while, but then either crashes or displays some rainbow-colored shader pic before crashing.

This happened to me whether I had mods or not.

Ditto on the help being amazing.
